subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : Dimethyl glyoxime forms a six membered covalent chelate when treated with NiCl 2 solution in presence of NH 4 OH . Statement (II) : Prussian blue precipitate contains iron both in +2 +3 oxidation states.

options.text: (1) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(3) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(4) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
